<small>Also see: **<big>[[H5871|עַיִן]]</big>** | **<big>[[H5878|עֵין חֲרֹד]]</big>** | **<big>[[H8179|שַׁעַר]]</big>**</small>

 II. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַ֫יִן‎</span> **noun feminine** ==spring== (of water) (connection with I. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ע‎</span> dubious; Late Hebrew ***id.***, Phoenician <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ען‎</span>; Assyrian <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***ênu, înu;***</u></abbr> Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">; Ethiopic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">; Palmyrene <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עינא‎</span>, [[BDB#Tg|ᵑ7]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֵינָא‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַיְינָא‎</span>; Syriac <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">); — absolute <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ע‎</span> [[1Sam.29.1|1Sam 29:1]] +, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עָ֑יִן‎</span> [[Gen.49.22|Gen 49:22]] +, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הָעַ֫יְנָה‎</span> [[Gen.24.16|Gen 24:16]]; [[Gen.24.45|Gen 24:45]] construct <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֵין‎</span> v[[Gen.24.13|Gen 24:13]] +; plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֲיָנֹת‎</span> [[Deut.8.7|Deut 8:7]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וֺת‎</span>- [[2Chr.32.3|2Chr 32:3]] construct <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֵינוֺת‎</span> [[Exod.15.27|Exod 15:27]] = [[Num.33.9|Num 33:9]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עִינוֺת‎</span> [[Prov.8.28|Prov 8:28]] ([[BDB#Ges|Ges]]<sup>«GKC:93v»§ 93v</sup>); — ***spring*** [[Gen.16.7|Gen 16:7]]; [[Gen.24.16|Gen 24:16]]; [[Gen.24.29|Gen 24:29]]; [[Gen.24.30|Gen 24:30]]; [[Gen.24.42|Gen 24:42]]; [[Gen.24.45|Gen 24:45]] (all [[BDB#J|J]]) [[Gen.49.22|Gen 49:22]] (poem in [[BDB#J|J]]), [[1Sam.29.1|1Sam 29:1]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֵין חַמַּיִם‎</span> [[Gen.16.7|Gen 16:7]]; [[Gen.24.13|Gen 24:13]]; [[Gen.24.43|Gen 24:43]] ([[BDB#J|J]]), compare [[Exod.15.27|Exod 15:27]] ([[BDB#J|J]]) [[Num.33.9|Num 33:9]] ([[BDB#P|P]]); <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נַחֲלֵי מַיִם ע‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וּתְחֹמֹת‎</span> [[Deut.8.7|Deut 8:7]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מֵימֵי הָעֲיָנוֺת‎</span> [[2Chr.32.3|2Chr 32:3]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תְּהוֺם‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ְ‎</span> [[Prov.8.28|Prov 8:28]] (i.e. of the sea); figurative <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֵין יַעֲקֹב‎</span> [[Deut.33.28|Deut 33:28]] (poem), i.e. Jacob's descendants. Particular springs are: 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **a.** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חֲרֹד‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ע‎</span> [[Judg.7.1|Judg 7:1]] (on location compare [[BDB#GFM|GFM]]). 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **b.** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַקּוֺרֵא‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ע‎</span> (***partridge-spring***) [[Judg.15.19|Judg 15:19]] (compare ***id.***). 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **c.** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רֹגֵּל‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ע‎</span> near Jerusalem (early sanctuary [[BDB#RS|RS]]<sup>Sem i. 157, 2nd ed. 172</sup>) [[2Sam.17.17|2Sam 17:17]] compare [[1Kgs.1.2|1Kgs 1:2]], on border of Judah [[Josh.15.7|Josh 15:7]], and Benjamin [[Josh.18.16|Josh 18:16]]. 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **d.** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַתַּנִּין‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ע‎</span> (***dragon-spring***) [[Neh.2.13|Neh 2:13]] (= **c** ? so [[BDB#RS|RS]]<sup>l.c</sup>.). — On <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שַׁעַר הָעַיִן‎</span> [[Neh.2.14|Neh 2:14]]; [[Neh.3.15|Neh 3:15]]; [[Neh.12.37|Neh 12:37]] see  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שַׁעַר‎</span>
